name: fireside-gaming
description: This projects represents a full-stack web app that enables users to connect with friends new and existing to play games together. They can also search and discover new games to play.

scripts.install-backend-dependencies: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.prepare-backend-database: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate
scripts.start-backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver
scripts.prepare-environment: npm run install-backend-dependencies && npm run install-frontend-dependencies && npm run prepare-backend-database

author: Thomas Anderson, Jeffrey Ganulin, King Nordee, Chris Williams
